item.title: InstructG2I: Synthesizing Images from Multimodal Attributed Graphs
item.description: INSTRUCTG2I: a novel graph context-conditioned diffusion model, generates images from multimodal attributed graphs, addressing challenges in graph size, dependencies, and controllability.
